NewsArticle.title: NewsArticle
NewsArticle.description: Represents a news article fetched and processed by the system.

region.description: The region the news article pertains to (e.g., US, IN, Global).

title.description: The title of the news article.

content.description: The main content of the news article.

urlSlug.description: URL-friendly slug for the news article.

tags.description: Relevant tags for the news article.

imageUrl.description: URL of the featured image for the news article.

imageAltText.description: Alternative text for the featured image.

publishedAt.description: Timestamp of when the news article was published.

JobPosting.title: JobPosting
JobPosting.description: Represents a job posting scraped from various job APIs.

region.description: The region the job posting is relevant to (e.g., US, IN).

title.description: The title of the job posting.

description.description: Detailed description of the job responsibilities and requirements.

url.description: URL to the original job posting.

salary.description: Salary information for the job (can be a range or specific number).

postedDate.description: The date the job was posted.

tags.description: Relevant tags for the job posting.

Tender.title: Tender
Tender.description: Represents a tender opportunity scraped from open tender portals.

description.description: Detailed description of the tender requirements and scope.

url.description: URL to the original tender document.

closingDate.description: The closing date for submitting the tender.

AdminSettings.title: AdminSettings
AdminSettings.description: Represents the configuration settings controlled by the administrator.

automationActive.description: A kill switch to globally enable or disable the automated processes (news, jobs, tenders). True to enable, false to disable.

plagiarismThreshold.description: The plagiarism score threshold. If a scraped content's plagiarism score exceeds this value, it will be discarded and rewritten.

/news_articles/{newsArticleId}.description: Stores news articles. Includes fields like 'region', 'title', 'content', 'urlSlug', 'metaTitle', 'metaDescription', 'tags', 'imageUrl', 'imageAltText', and 'publishedAt'. This collection is globally accessible for reading, but write access is restricted to authorized backend processes.

/job_postings/{jobPostingId}.description: Stores job postings. Includes fields like 'region', 'title', 'company', 'location', 'description', 'url', 'salary', 'postedDate', 'metaTitle', 'metaDescription', and 'tags'. This collection is globally accessible for reading, but write access is restricted to authorized backend processes.

/tenders/{tenderId}.description: Stores tenders. Includes fields like 'title', 'organization', 'description', 'url', 'closingDate', 'metaTitle', 'metaDescription', and 'tags'. This collection is globally accessible for reading, but write access is restricted to authorized backend processes.

/admin_settings/config.description: Stores global admin settings such as 'automationActive' and 'plagiarismThreshold'. This document controls the overall behavior of the automated system and can only be modified by authorized administrators.
